description: As Russia's president announces new plans, what have other countries done to tackle falling fertility?
title: How do countries fight falling birth rates?
title_page: How do countries fight falling birth rates? - BBC News
maintext: She says that while they may lead to a small increase in birth rates in the short term, with some people choosing to have children earlier, "it doesn't translate at the end of the day to a higher fertility rate. They have been used in a lot of countries and we see the same pattern".
